item.description:
I'll Always Know What You Did Last Improv Incubator....

....unless of course you haven't been to one yet, but whether you are first timer, second timer, or veteran to the incubator, you should come out this week for another week of fun, games, smiles, friends, and community!

This week we'll be doing some more exciting work with character and emotion as we try to deepen our scenes and get out of our head and into the heads of the characters we create for scenes.

Remember no improv experience required!

only $3-4 donation to cover the cost of renting the room and running this here website!

I hope to meet, greet, and improv with you all on Thursday!

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: I'll Always Know What You Did Last Improv Incubator....
